mean_cn: n. 自由裁量权，谨慎，判断力，判定，考虑周到
mean_en: the quality of being careful about what you do and say so that people will not be embarrassed or offended :the quality of being discreet
word_etyma: dis分开，分离+cret搞清，区别+ion名词后缀→谨慎，小心
short_phrase: have discretion and don't say bad things
sentence: We hear, see, and speak no evil - we have total discretion.
sentence_trans: 我们不听、不看、不谈坏事-绝对谨慎。
